title: My lol download doesn't save?WHY?
body: I am new to lol. I started downloading lol. it downloaded around 64 % only 1500 mb was about to go. i saw in the forum that if i leave the downlaod it will start again from the place i left the download. but when i closed the download it crashed. so i started again and  i saw download started again from 33%.  Can you tell me the reason? its so frustrating to start the download again from 33%.

replies.body: If you are stuck at 33% for a fairly long period or crashing after this period, then it's likely your network is having problems connecting to the patching servers.  Your best bet would be to use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is tuned up for League.  Hopefully, that will get you fixed up and welcome to lol!
IIRC, the download progress shows the percent done of what you were missing when you opened the client that time, not of the total needed.
